content: the heel flap k5 there are 20-13-13-20 66 stitches on the needles row 2 needle 1- k5 knit 12 through the back loop knit 2 together knit 1 through the back loop needles 2 and 3 - k26 needle 4 - knit 1 through the back loop ssk slip two ​ stitches knitwise individually then knit them together through the back loop knit 12 through the back loop and k5 © karola rehnström 2021 all rights reserved - for personal use only version 1 1 20210131 page 4 of 5 #generationssocks row 3 knit all stitches on needles 1-4 row 4 needle 1- knit until 3 stitches remain knit 2 together k1 needles 2 and 3 - k26 needle 4 - k1 ssk slip two stitches knitwise individually then knit them together ​ ​ through the back loop knit until the end of the row 2 stitches are decreased on this row keep repeating row 3 and 4 until 11 stitches remain on needles 1 and 4 and 13 stitches remain on needles 2 and 3 move one stitch from needle 2 to needle 1 and one stitch from needle 3 to needle 4 you now have 12 stitches on each needle 48 total foot knit all stitches using the main colour on the round until the length of the foot 12 5 cm 4 ½″ or 6 cm less than final desired foot length introduce the contrast colour and knit 4 row following chart b cut the main colour yarn toe decreases the toe is worked using the contrast colour row 1 needle 1 - knit until 3 stitches remain on needle 1 knit 2 together k1 row 1 needle 2 - k1 ssk slip two stitches knitwise individually then knit them together ​ through the back loop knit the remaining stitches row 1 needle 3 - knit until 3 stitches remain knit 2 together k1 ​ row 1 needle 4 - k1 ssk slip two stitches knitwise individually then knit them together ​ through the back loop knit the remaining stitches a total of 4 stitches have been decreased on row 1 row 2 knit all stitches repeat row 1-2 two more times then repeat only row 1 until 8 stitches remain break yarn ​ and pull the end though the stitches weave in ends and block © karola rehnström 2021 all rights reserved -
